title: Cutcontour
subTitle: Cutcontours are a magenta-coloured line that runs around a design that indicate the shape in which the product will be cut.
action: Look for 'Rectangular' or 'Custom Shape' in the order description on presta

options.action: Look for a magenta line around the customers design
Compare the customers file with the cPDF. If the customers file has no contour but the cPDF does, it means it was added during the check.

solution.title: Cutcontour
solution.action:
File is ok for reprint
File complaint in Presta

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: The cPDF sent to the supplier is correct, however a contourline was added during their process and printed incorrectly. We can reprint with the same file.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer
summaries.description: We’ve identified that an error occurred during our processing, resulting in an incorrect print due to an added contour line. To resolve this, we can offer you a discount on the current order, arrange a reprint with an altered file that we will provide, or issue a refund if a reprint is no longer feasible. Please let us know which option you prefer, and we will take the necessary steps to ensure your satisfaction.

summaries.title: Log in Presta
summaries.description: Complaint Department: Supplier Complaint Type: Printed Incorrectly

options.action: Automatic: Open the DTP Tab in Presta & check 'AutoCheck Artwork' box. Manual: 'Open the DTP Tab in Presta, check 'Attachments' box, and see agent name under 'Uploaded by.

solution.title: Cutcontour
solution.action:
Request a new file from Prepress
File complaint in Presta

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: Our artwork team added a cutcontour unnecessarily to the cPDF, which caused it to be printed.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer
summaries.description: Our artwork team added a cut contour unnecessarily to the print file, which caused it to be printed incorrectly. To resolve this, we can offer you a discount on the current order, arrange a reprint with an altered file that we will provide, or issue a refund if a reprint is no longer feasible. Please let us know which option you prefer, and we will take the necessary steps to ensure your satisfaction.

question.text: What type of order is this?

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: We need to review these case by case. Take into account such factors as: Priority Client, amount of orders total, amount of prior complaints, amount spent total, purchase price vs. customer price.

options.text: Purchase price is under 150 or New CMR

solution.title: Cutcontour
solution.action:
Request a new file from Prepress
File complaint in Presta
Check customer type & select one of the suggested resolutions

questions.title: Purchase price is under 150 or New CMR

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: The customer added a cutting line on a straight cut order, as we do not look for cutcontours in these type of orders the line was recognised as part of the design and processed without altering.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer (NEW)
summaries.description: As a special consideration for being a new customer, we understand that you may not have been fully aware of our processes. As an exception, we would like to offer you a free reprint of your order. However, we kindly request that you provide us with a new design that does not include the cutting line. This gesture is intended to ensure your satisfaction and demonstrate our commitment to delivering the best possible product.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer (RETURNING)
summaries.description: We understand that, as an experienced customer, you may not have been fully aware that cutting lines are not necessary for straight cut orders, as they are recognized as part of the design and processed without alteration. To ensure your satisfaction and as a gesture of goodwill, we are offering you a 10% discount on the current order or as a voucher for your next order. Please provide us with a new design without the cutting line to avoid any further issues.

summaries.title: Log in Presta
summaries.description: Complaint Department: Customer goodwill Complaint Type: Wrong artwork uploaded

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: Send a side conversation to Artwork_Complaints inbox with the artwork complaints macro.

options.action: Open the linked template on presta and read the description (if featured).

solution.title: Cutcontour
solution.action:
Request a new file from Prepress
File complaint in Presta

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: This issue might occur on round stickers as these are cut round standard by the supplier. A contour line was incorrectly added by the artwork agent.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer
summaries.description: We’ve identified that a contour line was incorrectly added by our artwork agent to your round sticker design. As round stickers are cut standard by the printer, this led to an error in the printing. To resolve this, we can offer you a discount on the current order, arrange a reprint with an altered file that we will provide, or issue a refund if a reprint is no longer feasible. Please let us know which option you prefer, and we will take the necessary steps to ensure your satisfaction.

summaries.title: Log in Presta
summaries.description: Complaint Department: Manual Artwork Check Complaint Type: Processed Incorrectly

summaries.description: This issue might occur on round stickers as these are cut round standard by the supplier. A contour line was incorrectly added by autocheck.

As round stickers are cut standard by the printer, this led to an error in the printing. To resolve this, we can offer you a discount on the current order, arrange a reprint with an altered file that we will provide, or issue a refund if a reprint is no longer feasible. Please let us know which option you prefer, and we will take the necessary steps to ensure your satisfaction.

solution.title: Cutcontour
solution.action:
Create a fixed cPDF
File complaint in Presta

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: A cutcontour without spot colour was added by the artwork agent, causing the printer not to recognise this as a cutting shape, rather as part of the design.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer
summaries.description: Our artwork agent added a cut contour without spot color, which caused the printer to recognize it as part of the design rather than a cutting shape. To address this issue, we can offer you a discount on the current order, arrange a reprint with an altered file that we will provide, or issue a refund if a reprint is no longer feasible. Please let us know which option you prefer, and we will take the necessary steps to ensure your satisfaction.

To address this issue, we can offer you a discount on the current order, arrange a reprint with an altered file that we will provide, or issue a refund if a reprint is no longer feasible. Please let us know which option you prefer, and we will take the necessary steps to ensure your satisfaction.

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: The cPDF is correct, however the supplier printed the cutcontour we supplied correctly on the file. We can reprint with the same file

summaries.title: What to tell the customer
summaries.description: Although the cPDF we provided was correct, an error occurred in the printing of the cut contour. To resolve this, we can offer you a discount on the current order, arrange a reprint with the same file at no additional cost, or issue a refund if a reprint is no longer feasible. Please let us know which option you prefer, and we will take the necessary steps to ensure your satisfaction.

options.action: Automatic: Open the DTP Tab in Presta & check 'AutoCheck Artwork' box. Manual: 'Open the DTP Tab in Presta, check 'Attachments' box, and see agent name under 'Uploaded by.

solution.title: Cutcontour
solution.action:
Request a new file from the customer
File complaint in Presta

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: The customer added a pixelated cutting line on a flat file, because of inattention during the artwork check process it was left in the cPDF and printed as part of the design.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer
summaries.description: We’ve identified that a pixelated cutting line added by you was not caught during our artwork check process, resulting in it being printed as part of the design. To resolve this, we can offer you a discount on the current order, arrange a reprint once you provide a corrected file, or issue a refund if a reprint is no longer feasible. Please let us know which option you prefer and provide the new file if you choose the reprint option. We will take the necessary steps to ensure your satisfaction.

summaries.title: Log in Presta
summaries.description: Complaint Department: Manual Artwork Check Complaint Type: Processed Incorrectly

summaries.description: We need to review these case by case. Take into account such factors as: Priority Client, amount of orders total, amount of prior complaints, amount spent total, purchase price vs. customer price.

solution.title: Cutcontour

questions.title: Purchase price is under 150 or New CMR

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: The customer added a pixelated cutting line on a flat file, as pixels are not recognised as cutcontour by autocheck this was not caught and it was processed as part of the design.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer (NEW)
summaries.description: As a special consideration for being a new customer, we understand that you may not have been fully aware of our processes. As an exception, we would like to offer you a free reprint of your order. However, we kindly request that you provide us with a new design that does not include a pixelated cutting line, as these are not recognized as cut contours by our system and are processed as part of the design. This gesture is intended to ensure your satisfaction and demonstrate our commitment to delivering the best possible product.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer (RETURNING)
summaries.description: We understand that, as an returning customer, you may not have been fully aware that pixelated cutting lines are not recognized as cut contours by our autocheck system and are processed as part of the design. To ensure your satisfaction and as a gesture of goodwill, we are offering you a 10% discount on the current order or as a voucher for your next order.. Please provide us with a new design without the pixelated cutting line to avoid any further issues.

summaries.title: Log in Presta
summaries.description: Complaint Department: Customer goodwill Complaint Type: Wrong artwork uploaded
